short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simplify UX for AWS SAML Page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Reformatting AWS page to allow login using dropdown selection or text input.

Features & Benefits:
- Allows quick SAML authentication into AWS accounts
- Quick login when a user has multiple accounts and roles to manage

For feature requests or bug fixes message me on LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/in/sriya/
